doc.title: Joe Petrosino: A Shot in the Dark
doc.plot: Joe Petrosino was the first man of justice that connected many crimes and realized that organized gangs committed many of them. This new phenomena of 'gangland' crime in America were laying the foundations of the "Italian Mafia". This is the story about the formation of the Mafia in America, how it began and the Italian immigrant boy who would try to destroy it.
